Package gabrielLopes.project2425.DevPackage.QuickFixApp.Utils

Class SharedPrefHelper

java.lang.Object
gabrielLopes.project2425.DevPackage.QuickFixApp.Utils.SharedPrefHelper
public class SharedPrefHelper extends Object
Handles saving and retrieving local preferences like user info, filters, and theme mode.

  • Method Details

    • saveAuthToken

      public static void saveAuthToken(android.content.Context context, String token)
      Stores the authentication token in shared preferences.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.
      token - Auth token to save.

    • getAuthToken

      public static String getAuthToken(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieves the saved auth token.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.
      Returns:
      Saved auth token or null.

    • saveUserId

      public static void saveUserId(android.content.Context context, int userId)
      Stores the logged-in user ID.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.
      userId - ID to save.

    • getUserId

      public static int getUserId(android.content.Context context)
      Gets the saved user ID.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.
      Returns:
      User ID or -1 if not found.

    • clearUserData

      public static void clearUserData(android.content.Context context)
      Clears all saved user data and preferences.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.

    • saveFilters

      public static void saveFilters(android.content.Context context, String mode, String spinner, String query, int budget, double distance)
      Saves filter settings based on mode (REQUESTS or PROVIDERS).
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.
      mode - "REQUESTS" or "PROVIDERS"
      spinner - Selected service type.
      query - Text query.
      budget - Max budget.
      distance - Max distance.

    • getFilterSpinner

      public static String getFilterSpinner(android.content.Context context, String mode)
      Gets the saved spinner filter based on mode.

    • getFilterQuery

      public static String getFilterQuery(android.content.Context context, String mode)
      Gets the saved query filter based on mode.

      public static int getFilterBudget(android.content.Context context, String mode)
      Gets the saved budget filter based on mode.

      Gets the saved distance filter based on mode.

    • saveThemeMode

      public static void saveThemeMode(android.content.Context context, int mode)
      Saves the selected theme mode.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.
      mode - Theme mode constant.

    • getThemeMode

      public static int getThemeMode(android.content.Context context)
      Gets the saved theme mode.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context.
      Returns:
      Saved mode or default mode.

    • applySavedTheme

      public static void applySavedTheme(android.content.Context context)
